problem.p: Imagine yourself in a grocery store. A shopping cart rests on a flat, slightly rough floor.
You give the cart a push and release it. What happens?

choicegroup.choice: The cart travels in a straight line forever.
The cart travels in a straight line and slows down until it stops.
The cart stops moving as soon as you let go of it.
